title: [Large-scale] Designing Ideological and Political Education for Nursing Programs Using Integrated Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and general understanding of educational settings
context.additional_context: Strengthening nursing education competencies integrated with political education for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the social values and ethical standards required in nursing practice.
Learners can design lessons incorporating ideological elements by applying integrated teaching methodologies.
Learners can analyze the process of value formation in learners using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
